text: Lewis Moore (born 4 June 1998) is a Scottish footballer who plays for Heart of Midlothian as a winger. He also previously played for Cowdenbeath, Forfar Athletic and Falkirk on loan. ==Career== Moore won the Heart of Midlothian U17s Player of the Year award in April 2015 and made his debut for the senior team in the final game of the 2015–16 season in a draw against St. Johnstone. He spent the following season on loan at Cowdenbeath where he scored his first goal in the Scottish Professional Football League against Forfar. After being loaned to Forfar for the 2018–19 season, Moore was loaned to Falkirk in August 2019.
